title: Multifrequency Low-level Laser-Assisted Mastopexy with Lipolaser LPL9002™ in 231 Consecutive Patients Dataset
content: This Dataset reports the clinical information and measurements of 231 patients who underwent multifrequency low-level laser-assisted mastopexy. The Dataset was collected between February 2021 and November 2023. These data were used to assess the effect of this procedure on breast ptosis degree and the nipple to sternal notch distance to know the evolution of breast ptosis. This article presents demographic, personal and familial history, anthropometric measurements, pto-sis degree according to the Regnault system, Nipple-to-Sternal Notch distance (SNND), and complications according to the Clavien-Dindo System. The collected data were in English, and the responses were anonymised to ensure the Colombian legal framework. The data were stored in a .csv file.
